heading: totally unhip
subheading: father time and mother nature have caught up with one of our rock 'n' roll icons: it's hip replacement time for eddie van halen. the 44-year-old guitarist needs the surgery, his doctors say, to replace a right hip damaged by years of jumping around on stage. well, we can't all be mick jagger now, can we? it's a drag gettin' old, man.
author: wired staff
text: father time and mother nature have caught up with one of our rock 'n' roll icons: it's hip replacement time for eddie van halen. the 44-year-old guitarist needs the surgery, his doctors say, to replace a right hip damaged by years of jumping around on stage. well, we can't all be mick jagger now, can we? it's a drag gettin' old, man.
